recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Akuntansi Keuangan, Akuntansi Keuangan Perusahaan, Akuntansi Keuangan Publik, Akuntansi Manajemen (Sarjana)
job_description:
Support daily accounting operations such as journal entries and data entry into accounting systems.
Manage financial documentation — invoices, petty cash, payment receipts — ensuring proper filing and organization.
Assist in verifying vendor invoices and employee reimbursement claims.
Collaborate with other departments (Procurement, HR, Sales) to ensure complete financial documentation.
